main event: A silver-colored object resembling a V-2 rocket was sighted by a USAF Airman over Los Angeles, California in 1948.
interesting points: The object was larger than a B-29,The witness followed the object with high-powered binoculars,The object's speed was estimated to be over 700 MPH,It left a blue exhaust trail,The observation was made during clear weather without any sound.
